alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued December 17 at 9:23PM EST until December 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Pasquotank, Camden, Western Currituck, Bertie, Chowan and Perquimans Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Widespread flooding of vulnerable areas will result in an elevated threat of property damage to homes and businesses near the waterfront and shoreline. Water will be 1 to 2 feet above ground level in some areas resulting in a sufficient depth to close numerous roads and threaten homes and businesses. Flooding will extend inland from the waterfront along tidal rivers and bays resulting in some road closures and flooding of vehicles.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.

area.areaDesc: Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Pasquotank; Perquimans; Western Currituck
